dt: {bc}a continuum of color formed when a beam of white light is dispersed (as by passage through a prism) so that its component wavelengths are arranged in order
{bc}any of various continua that resemble a color spectrum in consisting of an ordered arrangement by a particular characteristic (such as frequency or energy): such as
{bc}the range of frequencies of sound waves
{bc}the representation (such as a plot) of a spectrum
{bc}kinds of organisms associated with a particular situation (such as an environment)
{bc}a range of effectiveness against pathogenic organisms
{bc}exhibiting traits associated with {d_link|autism spectrum disorder|autism spectrum disorder}

dt.t: … quiet areas and sensory bags with headphones … and other ways to help kids who are {wi}on the spectrum{/wi} cope with unfamiliar, noisy surroundings.

… Stephanie Adams, cofounder of the Autism and Asperger's Society, said: {ldquo}We started the society because we wanted to make a place where people {wi}on the spectrum{/wi} can spend their time and not feel isolated. …{rdquo}

shortdef: a continuum of color formed when a beam of white light is dispersed (as by passage through a prism) so that its component wavelengths are arranged in order
any of various continua that resemble a color spectrum in consisting of an ordered arrangement by a particular characteristic (such as frequency or energy): such as

dt: {bc}an electromagnetic spectrum in which a decrease in intensity of radiation at specific wavelengths or ranges of wavelengths characteristic of an absorbing substance is manifested especially as a pattern of dark lines or bands

shortdef: an electromagnetic spectrum in which a decrease in intensity of radiation at specific wavelengths or ranges of wavelengths characteristic of an absorbing substance is manifested especially as a pattern of dark lines or bands

dt: {bc}the entire range of wavelengths or frequencies of electromagnetic radiation extending from gamma rays to the longest radio waves and including visible light

shortdef: the entire range of wavelengths or frequencies of electromagnetic radiation extending from gamma rays to the longest radio waves and including visible light

dt: {bc}the spectrum of a stream of gaseous ions separated according to their differing mass and charge

shortdef: the spectrum of a stream of gaseous ions separated according to their differing mass and charge

dt: {bc}the region of the electromagnetic spectrum spanning the radio frequency range

shortdef: the region of the electromagnetic spectrum spanning the radio frequency range
